Sign Up Free

Completely Managed
Crypto Mining

Your property, miners and ownership.
Our knowledge, software and support.
Default Contract Period : 3.3 Years/40 Months

A better way to invest in Bitcoin

Investing directly into cryptocurrency will not give you any returns unless the value of it goes up. Mining Provides a constant income.
Freedom and control over everything.
Get Started

Our Features

Bitcoin is the simplest way to exchange money at very low cost.

Safer Investment

Expert Service Providers

24*7 Hardware Runtime

Prints Money Faster than Other Business. ( 80-100% ROI annually )

FAQ

Disclaimer

  • Mining of Cryptocurrency is stable but the income changes to any value and we do not have any control over it.
  • The ROI period given is based on the current market, it can change over time.
  • At any point of time if there is an issue/repair with your mining hardware we will need to send it to the manufacturer for warranty which happens in extremely rare cases. During that time until we get a replaced card, the mining process will be on halt, The replaced card will be brand new . There are no repairs for these cards, only replacement. All Cards come with a 3 Years Warranty.
  • We use 94% Efficient HP Platinum Power Supplies to power the graphics cards which is the safest in the market. Any Damage to the card that does not cover warranty will not be borne by us even though properly maintained cards run for upto 4-5 years there is a 0.1% chance of electrical failure/ short circuit.
  • The Cards will be owned by the company, to make sure that the client/investor is not disturbed if there is a process of RMA or Replacement for the cards.
  • This Project is a contract for 3.3 Years / 40 Months only. Not from the date of purchase but from the date the mining has started.
  • All the hardware purchased will belong to the company after the project has come to an end as the cards come to an end of life and warranty also would have expired.
  • This is not a get rich quick scheme, what we perform is a proper crypto mining business that gives you the quickest return on investment compared to any other traditional business.
  • There might be a time known as a crypto bubble which can occur at any point of time and we don’t know if it will come or not, but when it comes the mining process will be on halt for 1-6 months depending on the market volatility because the profitability will be lesser than the electricity and maintenance.
  • If the mining process is on halt for more than 4 months the Client/Investors can opt for an exit if they want to, we can sell the card and provide you cash for it.
  • Any Update to the Mining process will be told beforehand and you will need to comply with the changes within the given time span, it will mostly be related to the change of the mining coin or wallets.
  • This Mining Farm is located in Chennai, TamilNadu. Power Cuts are not very common but there are Planned power outages once a month. No backup electricity can power these mining machines, so if there is a power cut, the machines will be on halt until it comes back.
  • All these risks may or may not occur but as a company we are obligated to share all the risks that might occur in the ongoing business.
  • All Revenue generated to the Clients will have no contact with the accounts of the company as it will be paid from the mining pool.
